400.description: The request URI does not match the APIs in the system, or the operation failed for unknown reasons. Invalid headers can also cause this error.

401.description: The user is not authorized to use the API.

403.description: The requested operation is not permitted for the user. This error can also be caused by ACL failures, or business rule or data policy constraints.

404.description: The requested resource was not found. This can be caused by an ACL constraint or if the resource does not exist.

405.description: The HTTP action is not allowed for the requested REST API, or it is not supported by any API.

406.description: The endpoint does not support the response format specified in the request Accept header.

415.description: The endpoint does not support the format of the request body.

get.summary: returns a list of DC Entry Event records

parameters.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results. To generate an encoded query for the results you want, go to the list view of the table in ServiceNow and create your filter. Then right click on the last filter in the breadcrumb style filter list and select 'Copy Query'. That is the query to use here. On most tables, passing 'active=true' will return only active records.
parameters.name: sysparm_query

parameters.description: Pass 'true' to return the display value of the record, pass 'false' to get the sys_id of the record, or pass 'all' to get both for reference fields.
parameters.name: sysparm_display_value

parameters.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields.
parameters.name: sysparm_exclude_reference_link

parameters.description: True to supress pagination header.
parameters.name: sysparm_suppress_pagination_header

parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response. Defaults to a list that will just get form fields
parameters.name: sysparm_fields

parameters.description: The maximum number of results returned per page.
parameters.name: sysparm_limit

parameters.description: Render the response according to the specified UI view (overridden by sysparm_fields).
parameters.name: sysparm_view

info.title: DataCenterEventAPI
info.description: Interact with DC Entry Event records in ServiceNow through the [ServiceNow Table API](https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/istanbul-application-development/page/integrate/inbound-rest/concept/c_TableAPI.html).
